name: Pizza
desc: Pizza is a savory dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients.

name: Samosa
desc: The samosa is a fried or baked pastry with a savoury filling, such as spiced potatoes, onions, peas.

name: Fried Rice
desc: Fried rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as vegetables. It is often eaten by itself or as an accompaniment to another dish.

name: Pasta
desc: Pasta is a type of food made from a mixture of flour and water that is formed into different shapes and then boiled. Spaghetti, macaroni, and noodles are types of pasta.

name: Idli
desc: Idli is a type of savoury rice cake, originating from the Indian subcontinent, popular as breakfast food in Southern India and among Tamils in Sri Lanka.
